attributes.additional_details: Start later so allow students to have more time in a morning to get up and get ready. Give them time to go out and enjoy the morning before school. Also giving them more sleep without the stress of school
attributes.background: Instead of starting school at approx. 8-9am start it at 10-11am

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition, which calls for similar action: "Require all schools to start at 10AM" https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/756158
